law.catch_line: To qualify for a Program loan, a group home sponsor shall own and operate a group home and be:...
law.text:
To qualify for a Program loan, a group home sponsor shall own and operate a group home and be:
a nonprofit organization;
an individual; or
a limited partnership if:
each general partner qualifies as a nonprofit organization; or
each general partner is a wholly owned subsidiary of a nonprofit organization;
the limited partnership is formed to undertake a group home project that is totally or partly eligible for a federal low income housing tax credit program or any other federal program or incentive; and
a nonprofit organization manages the project or receives the net cash flow from or the residual sale proceeds on sale of the group home.
